basics.name: Yufeng Xu
basics.label: Undergrad@NYUSH
basics.summary: A sophomore at NYU Shanghai. Doing research in CV & NLP.

work.name: New York University
work.summary: Conducting research in CV & NLP under supervision of Prof. Li Guo, Prof. Shengjie Wang, and Prof. Chen Zhao.

courses: Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision

awards.title: Recognition Award
awards.summary: The award is given to students who make great academic performance and contribute to the NYU community considerably.

publications.name: Cross Entropy versus Label Smoothing: A Neural Collapse Perspective
publications.summary: This paper investigates a peculiar phenomenon in Deep Learning called Neural Collapse from the perspective of loss functions.
